price: Manzanni mãsu bãyar da bushãra kuma mãsu gargaɗi dõmin kada wata hujja ta kasance ga mutãne a kan Allah bãyan Manzannin. Kuma Allah yã kasance Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima.
arabic: رُّسُلٗا مُّبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ لِئَلَّا يَكُونَ لِلنَّاسِ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ حُجَّةُۢ بَعۡدَ ٱلرُّسُلِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rusulan mubashirīna wamundhirīna li-allā yakūna lilnnāsi ʿalā al-lahi ḥujjatun baʿda al-rusuli wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
